title: Information Literacy Development for Interdisciplinary Research Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Research Methodologies in Mathematics and Experience in Data Analysis
context.additional_context: Strengthening information integration and utilization skills for in-service secondary math teachers collaborating with cross-subject teachers and experts on research

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three criteria for evaluating the credibility of information sources in interdisciplinary research scenarios
Learners understand how experts from other fields utilize information during collaborative research tasks and can develop research plans incorporating these approaches
Learners can identify and propose utilization strategies for at least two information resources (data, theories, etc.) from other disciplines applicable to mathematical research problems
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
